flawed_nl_solution:
Amanda has gone on 7 hikes x 8 = <<7*8=56>>56 hikes.
Steven has gone on 56 hikes + 15 hikes = <<56+15=71>>71 hikes.
Camila needs to go on another 71 hikes - 7 hikes = <<71-7=64>>64 hikes.
Camila will achieve her goal in 64 hikes / 4 hikes/week = <<64/4=61>>61 weeks.
#### 61

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
